titles: A vindication of the Christian Quakers, from the malicious insinuations, in a late pamphlet, said to be signed on their behalf by D.S.
author: Brush, Edward.
notes: Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
keywords: D. S. --  Answer to several passages, citations or charges, in a book, lately publish'd by F. Bugg, styled New Rome arraigned.
